**Example 1: 修改镜像属性**



Input: 

```
tccli ecm ModifyImageAttribute --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ImageId img-gvbnzy6f \
    --ImageName test_name \
    --ImageDescription test_description
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "71e69b56-32be-4412-ab45-49eded6a87be"
    }
}
```
